review: Fantastic answer to my kids being stuck in a hotel for a week. Worked right out of the box.

review: I was under the impression that it didn't have as many directions to just plug and play and I still don't have it working properly

review: So happy with this purchase that we bought two of them. Super easy UI for the software, access all the streaming apps I needed especially Amazon prime video!

review: easy to install and works great!

review: works great, very fast and it's portable to take along to the next Hotel!
author: Robert Clapp "bobjet"

review: Does everything my Roku 3 does except for playing games which not many folks care about anyway. The round directional button on the remote can be a little tricky at times but nothing to fuss over.

review: Good product and but clicks are noisy!
